page.title: 15Sharon's Day-Castle Kennedy
page.content: I live in a Wigtonshire village. At 12.30 we have lunch. Some people have it at school and others at home. I have my lunch at home. I have meat balls and toast. At 13.05 I go back to school and play 'King, Queen, Jock'. Somebody throws you the ball, if you drop it everybody runs away. When you get the ball you shout'Stop'. Then you throw the ball to hit some-one below the knee. When you hit them you are called duchess and the other person is out. When the bell rings we come in and do geography and painting. I paint a kite because we have just tried to make one at school. At 15.00 we have free choice so I do a word game on the computer. At 15.30 we go home and after playing I have sausages, beans and potatoes. Then I play on my computer. At 19.30 I watch 'Coronation Street' on television then go to bed.
